title: Provide Product Training Materials to a Retailer
description: A retailer's staff needs access to training materials for a wholesaler's products.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a retailer for training materials.
Provide the retailer with a link to the online training portal, which contains videos and guides.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the retailer the link to the training resources.

tasks.description: Set up user accounts for the retailer's staff so they can access the portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the user accounts.
